name: SleepNoiseRiverSounds
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise river sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise River Sounds lets you reproduce incredibly accurate river audio tracks audio tracks that will make you feel like you're relaxing near a river in the forest.
Play this skill when you need some relax or when you need to concentrate.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
